name: Comment Genius
author: Ciprian Popescu

sections.description: Comment Genius allows the user to create a customizable lightbox popup, suitable for Facebook Like/Share, Twitter Tweet, Google AdSense Ads and more. The popup is a pure textarea, in order to allow for source code copy/paste and it supports HTML code for custom text content.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the /comment-genius/ folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin via the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. A new Comment Genius menu item will appear in WordPress Settings with options, and general help
sections.changelog:

  • UPDATE: Updated WordPress compatibility

1.2.1

  • UPDATE: Updated plugin URL

1.2

  • First public release
